0.0.1.name: hubot-buscandriu
0.0.1.description: Hubot script para obtener ofertas desde buscandriu.cl

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish

readme:
# hubot-buscandriu

[![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/hubot-buscandriu.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/hubot-buscandriu)
[![npm downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/hubot-buscandriu.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/hubot-buscandriu)
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/lgaticaq/hubot-buscandriu.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/lgaticaq/hubot-buscandriu)
[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/lgaticaq/hubot-buscandriu/badge.svg)](https://coveralls.io/github/lgaticaq/hubot-buscandriu)
[![Maintainability](https://api.codeclimate.com/v1/badges/e9fca2bc267180cf5886/maintainability)](https://codeclimate.com/github/lgaticaq/hubot-buscandriu/maintainability)
[![dependency Status](https://img.shields.io/david/lgaticaq/hubot-buscandriu.svg)](https://david-dm.org/lgaticaq/hubot-buscandriu#info=dependencies)
[![devDependency Status](https://img.shields.io/david/dev/lgaticaq/hubot-buscandriu.svg)](https://david-dm.org/lgaticaq/hubot-buscandriu#info=devDependencies)

> Hubot script para obtener ofertas desde [buscandriu.cl](http://www.buscandriu.cl/)

Agradecimientos a [Jorge Epuñan](https://github.com/juanbrujo) por el gran aporte de [buscandriu.cl](http://www.buscandriu.cl/).

## Instalación

```bash
npm i -S hubot-buscandriu
```

Agregar `["hubot-buscandriu"]` en `external-scripts.json`.

## Ejemplo

```bash
hubot buscandriu
```

![buscandriu](http://pix.toile-libre.org/upload/original/1489681794.png)

## Licencia

[MIT](https://tldrlegal.com/license/mit-license)
